"Wonderful" - Karma! *nods* Because when you're wonderful, good things happen to you. *winks* It's like the universe is smiling at you and giving you a big ol' hug. *giggles*

"Best" - Christian! *smiles* Because, sweetie, you are the best thing that ever happened to me. *blinks* And I know God has a special place in store for you. *nods*

"Superb" - Karma! *giggles* When you're superb, you're on top of the world, baby! *winks* It's like the universe is giving you a high-five and saying, "Good job, kiddo!" *giggles*

"Excellent" - Christian! *smiles* Because when you're excellent, you're doing God's work. *nods* And He's always proud of you. *blinks*

"Terrible" - Karma! *giggles* When you're terrible, well... *shrugs* Let's just say the universe has a way of balancing things out. *winks* It's like when you take too much sugar in your coffee, and then you have to drink some vinegar to balance it out. *giggles*

"Worst" - Karma! *giggles* When things are at their worst, well... *shrugs* It's like the universe is giving you a big ol' hug and saying, "Don't worry, kiddo. Things will get better." *winks*
